courseInfo:
Course structure:

  • Classes Overview (2 min): A quick look over the differences between each of the virtual classes we offer. 

  • Learndot (3 min): Locate your course information, such as IP addresses and other necessary info.

  • Zoom (4.5 min): Connecting to your meeting and helpful usage tips.

  • Skytap vs. EC2 (3 min): Why, when and how to use EC2 vs. Skytap.

  • Walkthrough - EC2 & Showoff (10.5 min): How to set up your online classroom with EC2 and present your course material with Showoff.

  • Walkthrough - Puppetfactory (7.5 min): How to finish setting up your virtual classroom with Puppetfactory.

  • Walkthrough - Skytap (12 min): How to set up your online classroom for Windows using Skytap.
  • Troubleshooting & Final Notes (3 min): Resources for finding help and tips to keep in mind before starting your course.

 

After completing this course you will be able to:

  • Identify the differences between each of the virtual classes
  • Find important class information in Learndot
  • Log into and manage your Zoom session
  • Identify why, how and when to use EC2 vs. Skytap
  • Set up your classroom using Showoff and Puppetfactory
  • Locate troubleshooting resources for help
